anthology.seasonOneShort: God, season one I mean, what can I even say about season one. It has glory, it has vindication and discovery and bloodshed, and it has rock and roll. For christ's sake, it has the overhaul of the undercurrent of civilized government. It's a miracle we even got here.

heroWidget.title: couch gag
heroWidget.supportingNotion_1: Come bored, come tired and high, and gather here. Take a vantage point high on a hill and peer down at the world that's new and vibrant, and yearns to unfold itself for you. A world that exists between the seams of the couch and all around you.
heroWidget.actionButtonText: Read "The Origin, and What Came Before It"

originWidget.title: On our prolific origin...
originWidget.supportingNotion: Like all great and awful things, the origin of our story is something altogether familiar and singular. Join us and we'll witness our brave pioneers, as they journey through the Antarctic, and towards a demise that no one expected. Stumble onwards with us into the future.

supportingWidget.title: Come Join Our Cult!
supportingWidget.supportingNotion: Our pack is growing. That could include you. Sign up below for all the latest and greatest updates, included but not limited to; emails when new stories drop, first grabs at merchandise (including NFTs), and invites to cult mixers.

tertiaryWidget.title: Support our cause
